comment.author: 12306929@N04
comment._content: No WWF, No rebar, I wonder how long that pavement section lasted ?  The "Slump" looks acceptable so I'd guess the concrete would have had fairly high PSI. Subgrade appears to have compacted AB so all indications at this point in the process appear to be in sync with standards of today (likely ahead of those for the time when this was done ?)  what was used to consolidate the wet concrete ? The screed appears to be too far ahead of the finish to be useful.
